verses.1: Tua ciangin Shuah gam mi Bildad in dawng a,
verses.2: “Job aw, khawl hun nei thei lo ding na hi hiam? Hong khawl phot lecin, thu kong gen thei ding uh hi.
verses.3: Bang hangin bawng bang lelin kote hong ngaihsun a, mi haipi-in kote hong seh na hi hiam?
verses.4: Na hehna tawh nangmah a kigimsak bek na hi hi. Nangma hangin leitung kinusia dinga, mualte a kin khia dingin ngaihsun na hi hiam?
verses.5: “Migilo paʼ meivak kisumit dinga, cikmah hunin kuangkik nawn lo ding hi.
verses.6: Ama buk sungah a meivak mit dinga, ama inn sungah khua a mial ding hi.
verses.7: A khe kip ngei a, ahi zongin tu-in a khe bai ta hi. Amah in a ngaihsut khialhna a puk lawh hi.
verses.8: Thangsiahna ngen sungah amah bungbu tuk a, gum sungah amah kia hi.
verses.9: Thang ah a khetulin awk a, thangkhau in amah gakcip hi.
verses.10: Amah siahna-in leilak ah khauzak kitung a, a pai nading lampi ah thang kisiah hi.
verses.11: Lauhuaina in amah pang a, a kalsuanna khempeuh a sulzuih hi.
verses.12: A hauh ngei hangin tu-in gilkial ta a, siatna in a su dingin amah ngak gige hi.
verses.13: A kihtakhuai natna in a pum khempeuh tuam a, a khut le a khete muatsak mang khinta hi.
verses.14: Lungmuang takin a omna a inn panin amah kikai khia a, Sihna Kumpipa kiangah amah kitun pih hi.
verses.15: Ahih hangin zatui tawh ama inn a kisiansuah khit ciangin tua inn ah a ut peuhpeuh teng thei pah ding hi.
verses.16: Lei sunga ama zungte keu-in, a tunga a hiangte a si ta hi.
verses.17: Inn le gamah ama minthanna bei ta a, kuamah in amah phawk kha nawn lo hi.
verses.18: A nungtateʼ gam panin amah kihawl khia dinga, khuavakna mun panin khuamialna ah kihawl khia ding hi.
verses.19: Amah in suanlekhak nei lo a, ama teennasa munah ama gui a zom ding om lo hi.
verses.20: Nisuahna pan nitumna dong ama thuakna a za peuhmah kigaihin a liing uh hi.
verses.21: Migilote, Pasian a ngaihsun lote a thutawpna uh tu-a bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
